alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 8:38PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Foard, northern Knox, southern Wilbarger and northwestern Baylor Counties through 900 PM CST... At 837 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Gilliland to 14 miles east of Guthrie. Movement was east northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Crowell, Lockett, Thalia, Oklaunion, Truscott, Grayback, Gilliland and Rayland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
